TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TraceFilter extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供追蹤篩選器實作的基底類別。

span.span: Provides the base class for trace filter implementations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 追蹤篩選可用於由追蹤接聽程式提供了額外的篩選之外，還提供追蹤參數。Trace filters can be used by trace listeners to provide an extra layer of filtering beyond that provided by trace switches. 追蹤接聽程式的追蹤篩選可以在接聽程式的屬性。The trace filter for a trace listener can be found in the listener's property. 追蹤參數會判斷追蹤是否要傳送的追蹤接聽項。Trace switches determine if a trace is to be sent to the trace listeners. 追蹤篩選可讓個別的追蹤接聽程式，以判斷會追蹤寫入相關聯的輸出媒體。Trace filters allow the individual trace listeners to determine whether or not the trace is to be written to the associated output medium. 例如，由每個追蹤篩選條件，追蹤可能會寫入主控台，而不是由事件記錄檔。For example, as determined by each trace filter, a trace may be written to the console by a , but not to the event log by a . 篩選器，繼承自類別可供繼承的追蹤接聽項類別以執行所追蹤的事件篩選。Filters that inherit from the class can be used by trace listeners that inherit from the class to perform filtering of events being traced. 包含單一方法，其會接受事件資料，並傳回旗標，指出是否應追蹤的事件。 contains a single method, , which takes event data and returns a flag indicating whether the event should be traced.

public: abstract bool ShouldTrace(System::Diagnostics::TraceEventCache ^ cache, System::String ^ source, System::Diagnostics::TraceEventType eventType, int id, System::String ^ formatOrMessage, cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ args, System::Object ^ data1, cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ data);
abstract member ShouldTrace : System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache * string * System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType * int * string * obj[] * obj * obj[] -> bool

span.span: The that contains information for the trace event.

param.name: eventType
param.span: 其中一個 值，可指定引發追蹤的事件類型。

span.span: One of the values specifying the type of event that has caused the trace.

param.name: formatOrMessage
param.span: 供撰寫由 args 參數所指定引數之陣列使用的格式，或是要撰寫的訊息。

span.span: Either the format to use for writing an array of arguments specified by the args parameter, or a message to write.
An array of trace data objects.

summary.span: 在衍生的類別中進行覆寫時，判斷追蹤接聽程式是否應該追蹤事件。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, determines whether the trace listener should trace the event.

returns.span: 如果要追蹤指定的事件，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to trace the specified event; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，指出要執行的追蹤事件的追蹤事件型別等於時。The following code example shows how to override the method to indicate tracing should occur when the trace event type of the event is equal to . [!code-cpp[System.Diagnostics.TraceFilter#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.diagnostics.tracefilter/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceFilter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.diagnostics.tracefilter/cs/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceFilter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.diagnostics.tracefilter/vb/source.vb#2)]

span.para: 這個方法的實作應該傳回如果應追蹤的事件傳遞的參數所指定。否則這個方法應傳回。允許要傳遞至接聽程式的唯一錯誤事件的篩選條件，例如應檢查參數和傳回如果追蹤事件類型層級設定為或更大，否則應該傳回。方法的實作應該準備好處理中的下列參數： ， ， ， ，和。如果參數值為，參數不是事件的一部分。例如，如果參數是，它表示事件沒有任何引數。如果參數是，則沒有車子或沒有資料物件。如果有一個資料物件，它將位於參數。單一資料物件與資料物件的陣列之間的差異的原因是為了效能。沒有建立物件陣列，如果只有一個物件會進行追蹤，在正常情況下的理由。如果參數不是、參數也不能。這樣會保證，參數不是而不是空字串 ("")。方法的實作可以選擇性地擲回下列例外狀況:-如果是。 -如果不是其中一個值。 -與方法的實作不相關的例外狀況。例如， 。

Implementations of this method should return if the event specified by the passed parameters should be traced. Otherwise the method should return . For example, a filter that allows only error events to pass through to the listener should inspect the parameter and return if the trace event type level is set to or greater; otherwise, it should return . Implementations of the method should be prepared to handle in the following parameters: , , , , and . If the parameter value is , the parameter is not part of the event. For example, if the parameter is , it means that the event does not have any arguments. If the parameter is , then there are either one or no data objects. If there is one data object, it will be found in the parameter. The reason for the distinction between a single data object and an array of data objects is for performance. There is no reason to create an object array if only one object is traced, as is normally the case. If the parameter is not , the parameter must also not be . It is guaranteed that the parameter is not and not an empty string (""). Implementations of the method can optionally throw the following exceptions: - if is . - if is not one of the values. - Exceptions unrelated to the implementation of the method. For example, a .
